ticket.title: lib folder issue
ticket.original-body:
Installing ri documentation for rails-3.0.6... file 'lib' not found Installing RDoc documentation for rails-3.0.6... file 'lib' not found
I am tired of these error messages. Rails forgets to create the folder "lib" at /usr/local/lib/ruby/gems/1.9.1/rails-3.0.x/
Every time I update rails, I have to enter "sudo mkdir lib" to create "lib" folder by myself, and then "sudo gem install rails" again.
However, at version 3.0.6, it doesn't work. Because when I enter "sudo gem install rails" ， it will delete the whole “rails-3.0.x” folder.
Please fix it. It isn't difficult.
my environment
ruby 1.9.2p180 gem 1.7.2 rails 3.0.6
